original_text: And he called the name of the first daughter Jemimah, and the name of the second Keziah, and the name of the third Keren-happuch.
korean_text: 그가 첫째 딸은 여미마라 이름하였고 둘째 딸은 긋시아라 이름하였고 셋째 딸은 게렌합북이라 이름하였으니

sentences.original_text: And he called the name of the first daughter Jemimah,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 첫째 딸의 이름을 여미마라 불렀고,

sentences.original_text: and the name of the second Keziah,
and the name of the third Keren-happuch.
